title: Becoming a lOl manager
body:
After watching this emotionally stirring yet inspirational video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DmADtP6NWt4

I've decided to leave my well-paid finance job to pursue a career as an eSports manager. I'll be posting weekly blogs on my progress here. 

Friday 22/5/15:

Today I tried to force my way into the Riot Games office. I was restrained by security guards until police arrived and escorted me off the premises. I guess I should have left my airsoft guns and katanas at home. Will try again next week without the airsoft guns and katanas. Alright, maybe just one katana so I can show off my sword skills if I have to.

replies.body: I recommend keeping the katana on your person yet hidden, just incase you need to fight off Benji
